biocontainers.name: mentalist
biocontainers.summary: The MLST pipeline developed by the PathOGiST research group.

biotools.summary: A MLST caller based on a k-mer counting algorithm and written in the Julia language, specifically designed and implemented to handle large typing schemes.

bioschemas.summary: A MLST caller based on a k-mer counting algorithm and written in the Julia language, specifically designed and implemented to handle large typing schemes.
